item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, December 7, 2024 at 11:10 AM UTC
item.description:

3. Firefox Is the Superior Browser (41 points | 23 comments)
4. The Birmingham Blade: geographically tailored urban wind turbine designed by AI (23 points | 26 comments)

14. Lies I was told about collab editing, Part 1: Algorithms for offline editing (188 points | 69 comments)
15. Accessing a DRM Framebuffer to display an image (8 points | 1 comment)

29. Romanian court annuls result of presidential election first round (439 points | 892 comments)
30. RNA-targeting CRISPR reveals that noncoding RNAs are not 'junk' (118 points | 67 comments)
